titles.title: TAME Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act
TAME Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act
Transformational Artificial intelligence to Modernize the Economy against Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act
To direct the use of artificial intelligence by National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to adapt to extreme weather, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
